Title: The Wrath of the Lamb
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot, Nick Antosca
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: Will hatches a cunning plot to slay Francis Dolarhyde, using Hannibal Lecter in his ploy. Bedelia voices concern about the perilous plan as Will continues his game with Hannibal, though Will may have to face his darkest fears.
